text: Neosho Rapids is a city in Lyon County, Kansas, United States. 229 people lived here at the 2020 census. ==History== Before, people called it Italia then Florence. It was planned out in 1855. The city was named Neosho Rapids in 1857 from the whitewater on the Neosho River. == References == Category:Cities in Lyon County, Kansas
title: Neosho Rapids, Kansas
